backend/main.mo: Defines core data types for books, journaling, meditation sessions, rituals, and import/export structures, and initializes a predefined book list.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence records describing required frontend fixes, affected files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of numerous frontend files including components, pages, hooks, and configuration.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT_RUNBOOK.md: Provides step‑by‑step instructions for redeploying the application without code changes.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT_TROUBLESHOOTING.md: Template for diagnosing deployment failures across installation, backend, build, and runtime stages.
frontend/index.css: Defines base Tailwind layers and OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes along with global style rules.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry file setting up the app root, favicon, safety shims, and global error handlers before loading the main bundle.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes and wraps the app in an error boundary, theme provider, and toaster.
frontend/src/components/AmbientMusicCaro: Carousel for selecting and previewing ambient sounds with swipe navigation, mute, and volume controls.
frontend/src/components/AppErrorBoundary: React error boundary that catches rendering errors and displays a detailed fallback UI with error info and reload option.
frontend/src/components/CloudSyncErrorBa: Displays a retryable error banner for cloud sync failures with messages varying by error type.
frontend/src/components/DurationRangeInp: A slider-based duration input component allowing users to select a time range in minutes.
frontend/src/components/FloatingNav.tsx: Vertical floating navigation bar with icons that navigate to different app routes and show labels on hover.
frontend/src/components/HamburgerMenu.ts: Mobile slide-out menu providing theme toggle, account actions, and navigation, integrated with identity and query management.
frontend/src/components/JournalFiltersDr: Popover-based filter panel for journal entries with controls for favorites, mood, energy, date range, and text search.
frontend/src/components/KnowledgeBookPag: Paginated book-style viewer supporting swipes, keyboard navigation, and animated transitions between content pages.
frontend/src/components/KnowledgeCategor: Carousel component for selecting knowledge categories with swipe, keyboard, and button navigation plus dynamic card positioning.
frontend/src/components/KnowledgeQuizDia: Dialog-based quiz flow that shuffles questions, tracks answers, navigates between questions, and displays results.
frontend/src/components/lotus-r3f/LotusM: Three.js lotus model that animates petals, stem, and center glow based on growth state and theme.
frontend/src/components/lotus-r3f/LotusP: Three.js particle system around the lotus with coherent or chaotic motion depending on growth state.
frontend/src/components/LotusCanvas.tsx: Canvas-based animated lotus visualization with particles, responsive sizing, and theme-based visibility adjustments.
frontend/src/components/MeditationCarous: Meditation selector carousel featuring swipe navigation, circular indexing, and animated card scaling.
frontend/src/components/MeditationGuideS: Stepper for meditation instructions supporting swipe navigation, step indicators, and content parsing for benefits.
frontend/src/components/MeditationTimerR: Animated canvas ring showing progress with wave effects and theme-based colors.
frontend/src/components/MeditationWaveFi: Circular fill indicator using animated waves to represent progress inside a clipped region.
frontend/src/components/MobileBackButton: Mobile-only back button that navigates to the dashboard and optionally triggers a callback.
frontend/src/components/PageBackgroundSh: Layout wrapper that renders a themed LotusCanvas background behind page content.
frontend/src/components/ProgressBowl.tsx: Canvas-based bowl graphic showing liquid fill level with glow and wave animations based on total minutes.
frontend/src/components/ProgressLotusR3F: 3D lotus progress visualization using react-three-fiber with growth state, lighting, particles, and controls.
frontend/src/components/ProgressLotusSVG: SVG lotus that animates breathing, glow, and petal openness based on growth, streak, and theme.
frontend/src/components/QuizDialog.tsx: Multi-step quiz dialog that collects answers and computes a recommended meditation type.
frontend/src/components/RitualSelectionM: Modal that displays up to five saved rituals and lets users start or delete one.
frontend/src/components/SavedRitualsCaro: Carousel UI for browsing, starting, and deleting saved rituals with swipe and confirmation handling.
frontend/src/components/SessionIndicator: Shows guest or logged‑in session state and provides navigation and logout actions.
Header navigation with back button, theme toggle, session indicator, and mobile menu controls.
frontend/src/components/ThemedToaster.ts: Wrapper that renders the global toast component with a close button.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity and refreshes dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useCloudOperation.ts: Hook providing a retry‑enabled cloud write helper using the current actor and identity.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for managing Internet Identity login, storing identities, and exposing login status helpers.
frontend/src/hooks/useMeditationTimer.ts: Implements a customizable meditation timer with pause/start/reset, progress tracking, and completion callbacks.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating books, quotes, user profiles, journal entries, and guest/local fallback data.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global Tailwind-based styles, OKLCH color variables, themes, fonts, and animation utility classes.
frontend/src/lib/bookData.ts: Exports a curated list of book recommendations with metadata and Amazon links.
frontend/src/lib/knowledgeContent.ts: Provides structured educational content and quizzes for meditation techniques.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentity providers.
Empty or placeholder file for the Active Meditation page.
frontend/src/pages/BookRecommendationsPa: Interactive carousel page for cycling through book recommendations with swipe and button navigation.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Main user hub showing quotes, meditation options, and rituals with navigation to meditation flows.
frontend/src/pages/JournalPage.tsx: Journal management page supporting filtering, editing, favoriting, deleting, importing, and exporting entries.
frontend/src/pages/KnowledgePage.tsx: Knowledge library with technique categories, detailed content, quiz handling, and score persistence.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Landing screen providing login, guest mode, theme toggle, and redirect to dashboard when authenticated.
frontend/src/pages/PreMeditationPage.tsx: Complex setup page for configuring a meditation session, including type selection, duration, ambient sounds, guides, and recording preferences before starting the timer.
frontend/src/pages/ProgressPage.tsx: Displays user meditation progress with stats, rank visualization, and options to import/export progress data with cloud‑sync error handling.
frontend/src/pages/ReflectionPage.tsx: Empty placeholder page for reflection features.
frontend/src/pages/StatsPage.tsx: Empty placeholder page for detailed stats features.
frontend/src/utils/ambientSounds.ts: Defines ambient sound metadata and helpers to fetch sound info or audio paths by ID.
frontend/src/utils/cloudSync.ts: Provides standardized cloud‑sync error types and logic to convert backend errors into user‑friendly messages.
frontend/src/utils/cloudSyncRetry.ts: Implements retry logic for cloud operations, detecting readiness and authorization errors.
frontend/src/utils/exportImport.ts: Handles serialization and validation for exporting and importing meditation data, including sessions, journals, stats, and rituals.
Manages local storage of quiz scores per user, with hooks for reading and updating scores.
frontend/src/utils/lotusGrowthModel.ts: Computes lotus growth visualization parameters over a 0–20,000 minute scale using phases, smooth interpolation, and layered petal opening.
frontend/src/utils/meditationStorage.ts: Manages guest-only meditation journal, progress, and ritual data in localStorage with migration and CRUD helpers.
frontend/src/utils/meditationType.ts: Validates and normalizes meditation type strings, mapping aliases and defaults to supported enum values.
frontend/src/utils/progressRanks.ts: Defines progress rank tiers by total minutes and provides helpers for retrieving current, next, and formatted ranks.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utilities for reading URL/query/hash parameters and persisting them in sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme, colors, shadows, and plugins for typography, animations, and container queries.
project_state.json: Describes current project state, issues, and requirements, focusing on fixing authenticated ritual deletion and confirming recent UI fixes.
